Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I found that i could go into more detail and really press on the issues with my work and how to best improve the work. With a teacher especially due to time constraints i felt it was more difficult to go super in depth

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I preferred the straight up AI answers as I could make it tailor to exactly how i wanted it. whereas sometimes the teacher would sugarcoat or go in the wrong direction and i would feel bad about having to correct them and redo it.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: just the main one is specificity, i can tailor GENAI to exactly what i want without going off any tangent
